    • Method Detail

      • isClient

        public final boolean isClient()

      • setConnection

        public void setConnection(SchedulableConnection cnx,
                 java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Tells the listener what connection it is listening to and what input buffer the connection is using. IOScheduler and SelectionKey are available from the connection. This method should be called once and only once. This is a client connection, so this call will result in an initial sendData() call.
        Parameters:
        cnx - reporting SchedulableConnection
        buffer - input data buffer
